      • isCollisionMap

        public boolean isCollisionMap​(double xpos,
                              double ypos,
                              double width,
                              double height,
                              double deg)
        Checks RGB collision for pacman
        Parameters:
        xpos - x position of pacman
        ypos - y position of pacman
        width - width of pacman
        height - height of pacman
        deg - angle of pacman
        Returns:
        true if collision, else false

      • randPos

        public javafx.geometry.Point2D randPos​(double width,
                                       double height)
        Recursive method that finds random number in range of the map size and generates random coordinates until they arent in collision with the map
        Parameters:
        width - width of object
        height - height of object
        Returns:
        point2d object where there is no collision with other objects

      • isCollision

        public boolean isCollision​(int x,
                           int y,
                           int width,
                           int height)
        Returns if object from randPos method touches red color
        Parameters:
        x - x position of object
        y - y position of object
        width - width of object
        height - height of object
        Returns:
        true if collision, else false
